title: Vibrant Faces
bio: Kofi Mensah is a renowned street artist in Accra, known for his colorful portraits.

title: Urban Dreams
bio: Ama Serwaa captures the spirit of Accra’s streets with her vibrant murals.

title: Cultural Echoes
bio: Kwame Asante blends traditional Ghanaian motifs with modern street art.

title: Rasta Road
bio: Nana Yaw uses bold colors to reflect the Rastafarian influence in Accra’s culture.

title: Market Hustle
bio: Efua Danso paints the energy of Accra’s bustling markets in her work.

title: Drum Beats
bio: Yaw Boateng incorporates musical themes, celebrating Ghanaian traditions.

title: Sunset Smiles
bio: Adwoa Osei’s art brings warmth and joy with her depictions of daily life.

title: Freedom Flight
bio: Kojo Amoah uses birds and wings to symbolize freedom in his murals.

title: Ancestral Voices
bio: Esi Kwarteng draws inspiration from Akan proverbs and history.

title: City Pulse
bio: Kwesi Owusu captures the heartbeat of Accra’s urban life in his art.

title: Golden Heritage
bio: Akua Mensah celebrates Ghana’s rich history with gold-inspired designs.

title: Ocean Waves
bio: Nii Laryea’s coastal upbringing influences his ocean-themed murals.

title: Kente Colors
bio: Abena Sarpong integrates traditional Kente patterns into her street art.

title: Youth Rising
bio: Tetteh Quarshie focuses on empowering youth through his vibrant art.

title: Night Lights
bio: Maame Adjei uses neon colors to depict Accra’s nightlife in her murals.
